# categories

**Instance Property**

A set of category instances selected by the user.

## Declaration

```swift
var categories: Set<ActivityCategory> { get }
```

## Accessing Selected Categories

- **categoryTokens**: Tokens that represent categories selected by the user.

items.description: Tokens that represent categories selected by the user.
items.name: categoryTokens

title: categories
